attributes.action: Remove the ban of the XL bully’s
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s not the dog’s responsibility, it’s the owners that haven’t trained their dogs properly and haven’t treated them with love and care!
attributes.background: Ban the bad owners not the good dogs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
